sys_transform_map.name: External Data

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"><sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copy_empty_fields>false</copy_empty_fields><create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields>false</create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields><enforce_mandatory_fields>No</enforce_mandatory_fields><name>External Data</name><order>100</order><run_business_rules>true</run_business_rules><run_script>true</run_script><script><![CDATA[(function transformRow(source, target, map, log, isUpdate) {

	// Add your code here
	var grp = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
	grp.addQuery('name',source.support_team);
	grp.query();
	
	if(grp.next()){
		supt = grp.sys_id;
		source.support_team = supt;
		target.support_team = supt;
	}
	
})(source, target, map, log, action==="update");]]></script><source_table>x_552094_dros_external_data</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-11-12 05:06:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>e82ebbefdbd4a010ae0428df4b9619b9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>External Data</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DROS" source="x_552094_dros">3fd330ebdbdc6010ae0428df4b961902</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DROS">3fd330ebdbdc6010ae0428df4b961902</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_e82ebbefdbd4a010ae0428df4b9619b9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-11-12 06:12:47</sys_updated_on><target_table>x_552094_dros_imprt_data</target_table></sys_transform_map></record_update>
